attributes.title: NEW YEARS RESOLUTIONS , YOUTUBE COMMENTS, BIRD BOX
attributes.caption: GETTING HAZED BY THE PUBLIC
attributes.description: Cow Chop is coming in hot for 2019 with a fresh CCTV from funky-fresh Silverlake, California. During today's conversation we discuss; what we did over Christmas vacation, our New Year's Resolutions, and taking the good with the bad when it comes to reading our own YouTube comments. Also, stick around for our personal reviews on Bird Box, you won't be disappointed.
attributes.display_title: NEW YEARS RESOLUTIONS , YOUTUBE COMMENTS, BIRD BOX

attributes.title: MACHINIMA THROWBACK, 10 YEAR CHALLENGE, THE NEXT DECADE  • CCTV #49
attributes.caption: YOU'RE NOT MOVING YOUR HEAD WHILE YOU'RE TALKING
attributes.description: What happens when your podcast location falls through at the last minute? Why not turn to a place we all used to go but haven't been in a while? Within this Minecraft mansion lies a pool where Cow Chop has come to talk about what we were all doing 10 years ago, what we were doing on 9/11, and where we see ourselves ten years from now. And if you pay close attention, you might catch what happened to Brett's original Minecraft account.
attributes.display_title: MACHINIMA THROWBACK, 10 YEAR CHALLENGE, THE NEXT DECADE  • CCTV #49

attributes.title: JAMES IN RECOVERY, SKATE INJURIES,  WEEKLY LIVE STREAMS • CCTV #50
attributes.caption: SO YOU OVERCAME IT IN THE END?
attributes.description:
Get 15% off your first order at http://meundies.com/cctv
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/cctv
Add Honey for free at http://joinhoney.com/cctv


Our traveling freak show of a podcast finds us in a park in the Frogtown neighborhood of Los Angeles. With first-time CCTV guest, MATT, we talk abut what it's like having our star player on the injured list, our own worst personal injuries, and what people can expect to see on our new weekly live streams. And, last but not least, we pour one out for Machinima.com.
attributes.display_title: JAMES IN RECOVERY, SKATE INJURIES,  WEEKLY LIVE STREAMS • CCTV #50

attributes.title: HEALTH CARE REFORM ,ARIANA GRANDE, PACIFIC RIM 2 (feat. Khail) • CCTV #51
attributes.caption: LET'S ANARCHY
attributes.description: We met up at a secret spot in the hills behind the warehouse to to talk to KHAIL (https://twitter.com/KhailAnonymous) about all that has happened in the past couple of weeks. This includes but is not limited to; Aleks' blueprint to restructure the state, what a hot-mess the Grammys are (for anyone unfortunate enough to watch them), and one of the few perks that is now gone without our old friend Machinima.
attributes.display_title: HEALTH CARE REFORM ,ARIANA GRANDE, PACIFIC RIM 2 (feat. Khail) • CCTV #51

attributes.title: THE OSCARS, ADPOCALYPSE 2.0, ANSWERING TWEETS • CCTV #52
attributes.caption: I'M NOT WHITE
attributes.description: Cow Chop heads out to the Glendale Hills for the White Guys Podcast, where we discuss The Oscars, what's going on with Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper, the new Pokemon trailer, and answer some of the Tweets you threw at us including what's going on with Youtube and Adpocalypse 2.0.
attributes.display_title: THE OSCARS, ADPOCALYPSE 2.0, ANSWERING TWEETS • CCTV #52
